content: 3 double_crochet around r4 chain 3 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet repeat 20 sts r5 chain 3 double_crochet around r6 chain 3 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet repeat you ll end with 1 double_crochet 27 sts r7-8 chain 3 double_crochet around r9 chain 3 double_crochet increase 3 double_crochet repeat you ll end with 2 double_crochet 34 sts r10 chain 3 double_crochet around r11 chain 3 double_crochet increase 4 double_crochet repeat you will end with 3 double_crochet 41 sts r12-14 chain 3 double_crochet around r15 chain 3 double_crochet increase 4 double_crochet repeat you will end with a double_crochet increase 50 sts r16-18 chain 3 double_crochet around r19 chain 3 double_crochet increase 6 double_crochet repeat you will end with a double_crochet increase 58 sts r20-24 chain 3 double_crochet around switch colors you will now work the band r25 chain 2 half_double_crochet around 58 sts r26-29 chain 2 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop of each st around 58 sts large r1 10 double_crochet into magic_ring r2 chain 3 double_crochet increase double_crochet repeat 15 sts r3 chain 3 double_crochet around r4 chain 3 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet repeat 20 sts r5 chain 3 double_crochet around r6 chain 3 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet repeat you will end with 1 double_crochet 27 sts r7-8 chain 3 double_crochet around r9 chain 3 double_crochet increase 3 double_crochet repeat you ll end with 2 double_crochet 34 sts r10 chain 3 double_crochet around r11 chain 3 double_crochet increase 4 double_crochet repeat you will end with 3 double_crochet 41 sts r12-14 chain 3 double_crochet around r15 chain 3 double_crochet increase 4 double_crochet repeat you will end with a double_crochet increase 50 sts r16-17 chain 3 double_crochet r18 chain 3 double_crochet increase 6 double_crochet repeat you will end with a double_crochet increase 58 sts r19-20 chain 3 double_crochet r21 chain 3 double_crochet increase 14 double_crochet repeat around you will end with 12 double_crochet 62 sts r22-24 chain 3 double_crochet around switch colors you will now work the band r25 chain 2 half_double_crochet around 62 sts r26-29 chain 2 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop of each st around 62 sts cut the yarn and weave in all ends don t forget to make your pom pom to make a multicolored pom wrap two colors at once around
